TITLE: BarChart Parent Component Usage
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the Recharts BarChart component within a responsive container. The ResponsiveContainer ensures the chart adapts to different screen sizes.

SOURCE: https://github.com/recharts/recharts/blob/main/storybook/stories/API/chart/BarChart.mdx#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: jsx

```
import { BarChart, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts';

// Example usage:
<ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
  <BarChart data={data}>
    {/* ... other chart components like XAxis, YAxis, Bar ... */}
  </BarChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: LineChart Component Structure and Properties
DESCRIPTION: This section details the Recharts LineChart component's usage within a responsive container and lists its associated child components. It also references the Storybook ArgTypes for comprehensive property documentation.

SOURCE: https://github.com/recharts/recharts/blob/main/storybook/stories/API/chart/LineChart.mdx#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: APIDOC

LineChart:
  Description: Renders a line chart.
  Parent Component:
    - ResponsiveContainer
  Child Components:
    - XAxis
    - YAxis
    - ReferenceArea
    - ReferenceDot
    - ReferenceLine
    - Brush
    - CartesianGrid
    - Legend
    - Tooltip
    - Line
    - Customized

    - Documented via Storybook ArgTypes.
    - Note: Properties in 'Other' and 'Internal' groups are not recommended for use.

    <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
      <LineChart data={data}>
        <XAxis dataKey="name" />
        <YAxis />
        <Tooltip />
        <Line type="monotone" dataKey="uv" stroke="#8884d8" />
      </LineChart>
    </ResponsiveContainer>
```
